scripts.pretest: npm --workspace @darkauth/client run build && npm --workspace @DarkAuth/admin-ui run build && npm --workspace @DarkAuth/user-ui run build && npm --workspace @DarkAuth/demo-app run build
scripts.test: npm run pretest && PW_REPORTER=dot PW_ARTIFACTS=off npx playwright test --reporter=dot
scripts.test:e2e:run: COLOR_SCHEME=light PW_REPORTER=dot PW_ARTIFACTS=retain-on-failure npx playwright test tests/api tests/auth tests/security --reporter=dot
scripts.test:e2e: npm run pretest && npm run test:e2e:run
scripts.test:visual:run:light: COLOR_SCHEME=light PW_REPORTER=dot PW_ARTIFACTS=on npx playwright test tests/admin tests/user tests/demo --reporter=dot --workers=1 --output=test-results-light
scripts.test:visual:run:dark: COLOR_SCHEME=dark PW_REPORTER=dot PW_ARTIFACTS=on npx playwright test tests/admin tests/user tests/demo --reporter=dot --workers=1 --output=test-results-dark
scripts.test:screenshots: npm run pretest && rm -rf test-results-light test-results-dark && npm run test:visual:run:light && npm run test:visual:run:dark && node ../brochureware/scripts/collect-screenshots.js
scripts.test:ci: npm run pretest && npm run test:e2e:run && rm -rf test-results-light test-results-dark && npm run test:visual:run:light && npm run test:visual:run:dark && node ../brochureware/scripts/collect-screenshots.js
scripts.test:report: npm run pretest && PW_REPORTER=html PW_ARTIFACTS=on npx playwright test --reporter=html && npx playwright show-report
